name: Queens
description:
Paint the continent red!

Four queendoms were once in peace, until you, a bloodthirsty queen decided to slay others and control the whole continent! In this game, in order to solve the puzzles and slay the queens, you need to think your way through...

Caution

HTML build of the game has certain bugs related to the scene lightning. The bugs in question do not exist in the Windows build of the game.

Summary

The game increases in difficulty as you clear levels and sub-levels. There are a total of 3 levels with 13 sub-levels each with increasing difficulty. Each level has a different tile layout. The first level starts with 3x3 tiles, and it goes up to 5x5 by the last level. 

To clear each sub-level, you need to make every tile red, which is your queen's color. Your mouse clicks change the tiles' orientation where you click in a 3-by-3 area. During the first few sub-levels of the game, you'll get the idea of this mechanic without hesitation.

There also is a click limit for each sub-level, indicating how many clicks you can make to change the orientation of each tile to red. To clear harder sub-levels, you must focus on the game and try to see a couple of clicks ahead.

Controls

Here is the list of essential controls.

Navigation: LMB

Options: O

Mute Music/Sound: M/V
